item.title: Links
item.author: blackvolga@pm.me (GAZ23)
item.description: Basics Notepad http://etherpad.org/ Email https://protonmail.com/ Chat https://crypto.cat/ Mobile https://signal.org/ https://zerossl.com/ https://haveibeenpwned.com/ http://www.shodan.io/ CTF https://picoctf.com/ An always-open game targeted for high school students http://ghostintheshellcode.com/ An annual capture-the-flag contest that takes place Jan/Feb. Challenges https://www.microcorruption.com/ Play entirely in your browser http://pwnadventure.com/ Hack the Pwn Adventure 3: Pwnie Island MMORPG http://overthewire.org/ This is a series of games played over SSH

item.title: Reading List
item.author: blackvolga@pm.me (GAZ23)
item.description: CTF Field Guide Metasploit Unleashed Digital Privacy at borders Videos * Internet Security Weakness and Targets Lectures 2017/18 * Introductory x86 Courses Cybary Certified Information Systems Security Professional Advanced Penetration Testing Course follows book “Penetration Testing: A Hands-On Introduction to Hacking” that Georgia Weidman wrote MIT Advanced Topics in Cryptography 2003 Cryptography and Cryptanalysis 2005 Network and Computer Security 2014
